data.title: Daniels Chapel of the Roses Funeral Home & Crematory, Inc.
data.meta_description: Daniels Chapel of the Roses Funeral Home and Crematory, Inc. offers funeral, memorial, and cremation services in Santa Rosa, CA and the surrounding areas.
data.text:
Welcome to Daniels Chapel of the Roses in Santa Rosa, CA

In Immediate Need? Call Us Any Time phone (707) 525-3730

Since 1875, Daniels Chapel of the Roses Funeral Home and Crematory, Inc. has been honored to serve thousands of families during their times of need. We are on standby to help families complete the relationship with the deceased and offer emotional support. Our team has experience working with families from all religious and cultural backgrounds. Our family-owned business believes that service is everything. Therefore, when arranging your final service, we have one purpose in mind â€“ to create a unique and dignified service for your loved one.

Our team at Daniels Chapel of the Roses Funeral Home and Crematory, Inc. offers full funeral services from the viewing to the graveside services and everything in between. In addition, you can count on special services like military honors or veterans services for those who qualify. Life celebrations are a more casual alternative to funerals, with music, dancing, and an outside venue. You can make your end-of-life celebration anything you want it to be with our planning team to support you.

Cremation services are a popular option and do not have to be without a service. If you are interested in the procedure alone, choose direct cremation. For a formal service where family and friends can gather and pay their final respects, choose cremation with a memorial service. The great thing about memorial services is that there is no rush to schedule the event. You can wait weeks after the cremation if it is most convenient for the family. You may choose to display the ashes or scatter the ashes at the service. Our on-site crematory leaves families feeling secure and confident about the handling of their loved ones during the cremation process.

Daniels Chapel of the Roses Funeral Home and Crematory, Inc. serves the communities of Santa Rosa, Rohnert Park, Petaluma, Cloverdale, Windsor, Healdsburg, Sebastopol, Kenwood, and Sonoma. Our involvement in the community is something we take pride in. You will find that we sell all necessary funeral products from the funeral home for the families convenience. Browse through caskets, urns, memorials, and vaults to find the products that are right for you.
